definitions.definition: at what time; on what occasion

examples.text: When did you last see him?
When *(= in what circumstances)* would such a solution be possible?

definitions.definition: used after an expression of time to mean ‘at which’ or ‘on which’

examples.text: Sunday is the only day when I can relax.
There are times when I wonder why I do this job.

definitions.definition: at which time; on which occasion

examples.text: The last time I went to Scotland was in May, when the weather was beautiful.

wordOrigin: Old English hwanne, hwenne; of Germanic origin; related to German wenn ‘if’, wann ‘when’.
